LanguageData:
{SOURCE_nameDef} has implanted a copy of {SOURCE_possessive} xenogerm into {RECIPIENT_nameDef}, passing all xenogenes onto {RECIPIENT_objective}. 

{RECIPIENT_nameDef} will be in a xenogermination coma for the next {COMADURATION} while {RECIPIENT_possessive} body adjusts to the changes. 

{SOURCE_nameDef} will suffer from gene loss shock for the next {SHOCKDURATION}. {SOURCE_possessive} genes will also need to regrow. 

{SOURCE_nameDef}'s genes will need to regrow. This process takes time. If {SOURCE_nameDef} implants {SOURCE_possessive} xenogerm again before {SOURCE_possessive} genes have regrown, {SOURCE_pronoun} will die.
Genes extracted {RECIPIENT_nameDef} has extracted a copy of {SOURCE_nameDef}'s genes and implanted {RECIPIENT_objective}self with a xenogerm containing those genes. This process takes time. If {SOURCE_nameDef} has {SOURCE_possessive} genes extracted again before {SOURCE_possessive} genes have regrown, {SOURCE_pronoun} will die. //fte
